claims.object: Middle of the mount's adjusting stud

surface_layer.definition: A component that should ideally be positioned in the center of the adjusting stud of an engine mount.
common_uses: Securing the engine to the mount
Providing a stable base for the engine

deep_layer.mechanism: Proper positioning of the engine bracket ensures optimal support and alignment of the engine within the vehicle.

examples: Checking engine bracket placement during installation
